name: The Pagemaster
overview: Discover a World Where Imagination and Adventure Run Wild! As Richard Tyler you enter the animated world of the Pagemaster through a gigantic library filled with daring challenges, secret passageways and traps galore! Battle through countless adventures to escape this animated dimension and return to the real world. Find all of the hidden library cards and take your new found friends - Adventure, Horror and Fantasy - with you through a special ending only the best players will ever see!
